dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 4060 IH: Food Access and Stability Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Caraveo (for herself, Mrs. Sykes, Mrs. Hayes, Mr. Carter of Louisiana, Ms. Moore of Wisconsin, Mr. Smith of Washington, Ms. DelBene, Ms. Norton, Mr. Carson, Mr. Payne, Mr. Evans, Ms. Bonamici, Ms. Titus, Ms. Garcia of Texas, Mrs. Watson Coleman, Ms. Adams, and Ms. Escobar) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Fiscal Responsibility Act of 2023 to repeal the sunset of the work requirement exemption applicable to homeless individuals, veterans, and foster care individuals for the purpose of determining eligibility to receive supplemental nutrition assistance program benefits under the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Food Access and Stability Act of 2023.
Section 311(b)(2) of title II of division C of the Fiscal Responsibility Act of 2023 (Public Law 118â€“5) is amended by striking subsection (a) and inserting subsection (a)(1).
